aqlfunction Class

Defined in: lib/api/aqlfunction.js:3
Module: aqlfunction
Parent Module: arango

The api module "aqlfunction" to define user functions in ArangoDB.

  • Index
  • Methods

Item Index

Methods

  • create
  • delete
  • get

Methods

create

(
  • name
  • code
  • [isDeterministic]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/aqlfunction.js:14

Creates a user defined AQL function.

Parameters:

  • name String
    • name of the function.
  • code String
    • the function.
  • [isDeterministic] Boolean optional
    • boolean value to indicate that the function results are fully deterministic.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.

Returns:

Promise:

delete

(
  • name
  • [group]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/aqlfunction.js:35

Deletes a user defined AQL function.

Parameters:

  • name String
    • name of the function.
  • [group] Boolean optional
    • if set to true all functions is the namespace set in name will be deleted.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.

Returns:

Promise:

get

(
  • [namespace]
  • callback
)
Promise

Defined in lib/api/aqlfunction.js:47

Returns all user defined AQL functions.

Parameters:

  • [namespace] String optional
    • If set only functions in this namespace will be returned.
  • callback Function
    • The callback function.

Returns:

Promise:
